TopicTitle: The liquid-fuel rocket engine doesn't work.

Articles.Content:
If I install a liquid-fuel rocket engine, mount the rocket on the launch pad and fire the liquid-fuel rocket engine, then it won't work. Here's a screenshot : 

it's first :https://cdn1.savepice.ru/uploads/2019/12/22/9b45f71925279c278a546ceee903afa4-full.png

is's second : https://cdn1.savepice.ru/uploads/2019/12/22/f3b63be69a346e061a99793f0c4e612e-full.png

Your throttle appears to be at zero.

You can instantly set throttle to max with the 'Z' key, or throttle up (Shift), throttle down (Ctrl)

Also, moving to Gameplay Questions.
